DOC.brief_title: In-Vivo Assessment Adipose Allograft Extracellular Matrix Abdominoplasty Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , two arm , single center study ass adipose tissue development retention implantable allograft adipose matrix ( 'AAM ' ) inject abdominal subcutaneous tissue healthy volunteer undergo elective standard-of-care panniculectomy . This study enroll ten ( 10 ) subject . These subject randomize one two study arm . Arm 1 consist five ( 5 ) subject receive injection AAM follow clinically three ( 3 ) month duration , arm 2 consist five ( 5 ) subject receive injection AAM follow clinically six ( 6 ) month duration . At point completion arm , 3 6 month , inject tissue surgically remove part panniculectomy procedure . Samples AAM inject tissue area surround tissue obtain process histologic evaluation .

If female , must willing utilize acceptable method birth control ( i.e. , oral contraceptive , condom spermicide , etc . ) duration study . Thickness subcutaneous tissue abdominal wall le 2cm thick . Previous liposuction intend sit treatment . Actively take immunosuppressive therapy include systemic steroid ( intranasal/inhaled steroid acceptable ) .
